s: March 25, 2024 - Same excuse given to all: we cant refund it after it left our facility- gives you a tracking number that never moves after Walker Edison inputs 'left our facility' 1 day after orders are placed. Pretty good con huh? After reading these reviews, I'm LUCKY it was thru Amazon!!
